TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InternalsVisibleToAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class InternalsVisibleToAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class InternalsVisibleToAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 將通常只有在目前組件中可見的類型，指定為指定組件中可見的。

span.span: Specifies that types that are ordinarily visible only within the current assembly are visible to a specified assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般情況下，類型和成員`internal`範圍 （C# 中） 和`friend`（在 Visual Basic) 的範圍會顯示只有在定義所在的組件。Ordinarily, types and members with `internal` scope (in C#) and `friend` scope (in Visual Basic) are visible only in the assembly in which they are defined. 屬性可讓也看到這些類型在指定的組件，也就是 friend 組件中。The attribute makes them also visible to the types in a specified assembly, which is known as a friend assembly. 組件層級套用屬性。The attribute is applied at the assembly level. 這表示它可以包含在原始程式碼檔案中，開頭，或它可以包含在 Visual Studio 專案的 AssemblyInfo 檔案。This means that it can be included at the beginning of a source code file, or it can be included in the AssemblyInfo file in a Visual Studio project. 您可以使用屬性來指定單一的 friend 組件的內部型別和目前的組件的成員可以存取。You can use the attribute to specify a single friend assembly that can access the internal types and members of the current assembly. 您可以定義多個 friend 組件有兩種。You can define multiple friend assemblies in two ways. 它們可顯示為個別的組件層級屬性，如下列範例所示。They can appear as individual assembly-level attributes, as the following example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/cs/multiple1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/vb/multiple1.vb#3)] 也可以使用不同出現標記，但單一`assembly`關鍵字，如下列範例說明。They can also appear with separate tags but a single `assembly` keyword, as the following example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/cs/multiple2.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/vb/multiple2.vb#4)] Friend 組件由建構函式。The friend assembly is identified by the constructor. 目前組件的 friend 組件都必須是不帶正負號，或兩個組件必須經過強式名稱。Both the current assembly and the friend assembly must be unsigned, or both assemblies must be signed with a strong name. 如果這兩個組件是不帶正負號，`assemblyName`引數包含指定不含目錄路徑或檔案名稱副檔名的 friend 組件名稱。If both assemblies are unsigned, the `assemblyName` argument consists of the name of the friend assembly, specified without a directory path or file name extension. 如果兩個組件簽署以強式名稱、 引數建構函式必須包含目錄路徑或檔案名稱副檔名，以及完整的公開金鑰 （和不其公開金鑰語彙基元） 沒有組件的名稱。If both assemblies are signed with a strong name, the argument to the constructor must consist of the name of the assembly without its directory path or file name extension, along with the full public key (and not its public key token). 若要取得完整公開金鑰的強式名稱組件，請參閱[取得完整公開金鑰](#Key)本文中稍後的章節。To get the full public key of a strong-named assembly, see the [Getting the full public key](#Key) section later in this article. 如需有關使用強式名稱組件，請參閱建構函式。For more information about using with strong-named assemblies, see the constructor. 不包含值， ，或引數中的欄位; Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 編譯器會將此視為編譯器錯誤。Do not include values for the , , or field in the argument; the Visual Basic, C#, and C++ compilers treat this as a compiler error. 如果您使用的編譯器，不將它視為錯誤 (例如[IL 組譯工具 (ILAsm.exe)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)) 以及組件的強式名稱，指定的 friend 組件存取第一次擲回例外狀況包含組件屬性。If you use a compiler that does not treat it as an error (such as the [IL Assembler (ILAsm.exe)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)) and the assemblies are strong-named, a exception is thrown the first time the specified friend assembly accesses the assembly that contains the attribute. 如需如何使用這個屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱下列主題：For more information about how to use this attribute, see the following topics: - [Friend 組件 (C++)Friend Assemblies (C++)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d55fee0-b7c2-4fbe-a23b-dfe424dc71cd) - [Friend 組件Friend Assemblies](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/df0c70ea-2c2a-4bdc-9526-df951ad2d055) ## 取得完整的公開金鑰Getting the full public key 您可以使用[強式名稱工具 (Sn.exe)](~/docs/framework/tools/sn-exe-strong-name-tool.md)完整公開金鑰擷取強式名稱金鑰 (.snk) 檔案。You can use the [Strong Name Tool (Sn.exe)](~/docs/framework/tools/sn-exe-strong-name-tool.md) to retrieve the full public key from a strong-named key (.snk) file. 若要這樣做，您可以執行下列步驟：To do this, you perform the following steps: 1. 從強式名稱金鑰檔擷取公開金鑰，不同的檔案：Extract the public key from the strong-named key file to a separate file: **Sn -p** *snk_file* *outfile***Sn -p** *snk_file* *outfile* 2. 在主控台中顯示完整的公開金鑰：Display the full public key to the console: **Sn-tp***outfile***Sn -tp** *outfile* 3. 複製並貼到您的程式碼的完整公開金鑰值。Copy and paste the full public key value into your source code. ## 編譯 C# 的 friend 組件Compiling the friend assembly with C# 如果您使用 C# 編譯器來編譯 friend 組件時，您必須使用明確指定輸出檔 （.exe 或.dll） 的名稱 **/out**編譯器選項。If you use the C# compiler to compile the friend assembly, you must explicitly specify the name of the output file (.exe or .dll) by using the **/out** compiler option. 因為編譯器尚未針對在繫結至外部參考時所建立的組件產生名稱，所以這是必要動作。This is required because the compiler has not yet generated the name for the assembly it is building at the time it is binding to external references. **/Out**編譯器選項是選擇性的 Visual Basic 編譯器，而且對應 **-out**或 **-o**編譯 friend 時，應該不使用編譯器選項使用 F # 編譯器的組件。The **/out** compiler option is optional for the Visual Basic compiler, and the corresponding **-out** or **-o** compiler option should not be used when compiling friend assemblies with the F# compiler. ## 編譯 c + + 的 friend 組件Compiling the friend assembly with C++ 在 c + +，才能啟用的內部成員屬性存取的 friend 組件，您必須使用`as_friend`c + + 指示詞中的屬性。In C++, in order to make the internal members enabled by the attribute accessible to a friend assembly, you must use the `as_friend` attribute in the C++ directive. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Friend 組件 （c + +）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d55fee0-b7c2-4fbe-a23b-dfe424dc71cd)。For more information, see [Friend Assemblies (C++)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d55fee0-b7c2-4fbe-a23b-dfe424dc71cd). ## Examples **簽署的組件****Signed assemblies** 下列範例會使用屬性，而讓`internal`方法名為`AppendDirectorySeparator`帶正負號的另一個組件中可見的簽署組件中。The following example uses the attribute to make an `internal` method named `AppendDirectorySeparator` in a signed assembly visible to another signed assembly. 它會定義`FileUtilities`類別，其中包含內部`AppendDirectorySeparator`方法。It defines a `FileUtilities` class that includes an internal `AppendDirectorySeparator` method. 屬性會套用至包含的組件`FileUtilities`類別。The attribute is applied to the assembly that contains the `FileUtilities` class. 屬性可讓組件名為`Friend1`存取這個內部成員。The attribute allows an assembly named `Friend1` to access this internal member. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/cs/assembly1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/vb/assembly1.vb#1)] 如果要將下列範例編譯至名為強式名稱組件`Friend1`、`Example.Main`方法中的`Friend1`可以成功呼叫`FileUtilities.AppendDirectorySeparator`方法中，雖然方法內部，但是`Assembly1`組件。If the following example is compiled into a strong-named assembly named `Friend1`, the `Example.Main` method in `Friend1` can successfully call the `FileUtilities.AppendDirectorySeparator` method, although the method is internal to the `Assembly1` assembly. 請注意，是否您從命令列編譯 C# 中，您必須使用 **/out**編譯器參數，以確保編譯器繫結至外部參考時，是使用 friend 組件的名稱。Note that if you are compiling in C# from the command line, you must use the **/out** compiler switch to ensure that the name of the friend assembly is available when the compiler binds to external references. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/cpp/friend1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/cs/friend1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/vb/friend1.vb#2)] **不帶正負號的組件****Unsigned assemblies** 下列範例會使用屬性，而讓`internal`的不帶正負號的組件到另一個可見的成員未簽署的組件。The following example uses the attribute to make an `internal` member of an unsigned assembly visible to another unsigned assembly. 屬性可確保`internal``StringLib.IsFirstLetterUpperCase`名為組件中的方法`UtilityLib`都可以看到名為組件中的程式碼`Friend2`。The attribute ensures that the `internal` `StringLib.IsFirstLetterUpperCase` method in an assembly named `UtilityLib` is visible to the code in an assembly named `Friend2`. 以下是 UtilityLib.dll 的原始程式碼：The following is the source code for UtilityLib.dll: [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/cs/utilitylib.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/vb/utilitylib.vb#5)] 下列範例提供的原始程式碼`Friend2`組件。The following example provides the source code for the `Friend2` assembly. 請注意，是否您從命令列編譯 C# 中，您必須使用 **/out**編譯器參數，以確保編譯器繫結至外部參考時，是使用 friend 組件的名稱。Note that if you are compiling in C# from the command line, you must use the **/out** compiler switch to ensure that the name of the friend assembly is available when the compiler binds to external references. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/cpp/friend2.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/cs/friend2.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/vb/friend2.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string assemblyName) cil managed

span.span: The name of a friend assembly.

summary.span: 使用指定的 Friend 組件名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the name of the specified friend assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式定義為 friend 組件，也就是具有存取權的內部類型和成員的目前組件的組件。The constructor defines a friend assembly, which is an assembly that has access to the internal types and members of the current assembly. 目前組件的 friend 組件都必須是不帶正負號，或兩者都必須使用強式名稱簽署。Both the current assembly and the friend assembly must be unsigned, or both must be signed with a strong name. (如需有關強式名稱組件的詳細資訊，請參閱[Creating and using strong-named Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/create-and-use-strong-named-assemblies.md)。)如果兩者都是不帶正負號，`assemblyName`引數包含指定不含目錄路徑或檔案副檔名的 friend 組件名稱。(For more information about strong-named assemblies, see [Creating and Using Strong-Named Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/create-and-use-strong-named-assemblies.md).) If both are unsigned, the `assemblyName` argument consists of the name of the friend assembly, specified without a directory path or file extension. 如果兩者都經過簽署，`assemblyName`包含 friend 不含組件及其目錄路徑或檔案名稱副檔名，以及其完整公開金鑰 （但不是與其公開金鑰語彙基元） 的名稱。If both are signed, `assemblyName` consists of the name of the friend assembly without its directory path or file name extension, along with its full public key (but not its public key token). 強式名稱，例如文化特性、 版本或處理器架構的資訊，請提供其他元件中不能指定`assemblyName`引數。The other components of a strong name, such as those that provide culture, version, or processor architecture information, cannot be specified in the `assemblyName` argument. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您使用 C# 編譯器來編譯 friend 組件時，您必須使用明確指定輸出檔 （.exe 或.dll） 的名稱 **/out**編譯器選項。If you use the C# compiler to compile the friend assembly, you must explicitly specify the name of the output file (.exe or .dll) by using the **/out** compiler option. 因為編譯器尚未針對在繫結至外部參考時所建立的組件產生名稱，所以這是必要動作。This is required because the compiler has not yet generated the name for the assembly it is building at the time it is binding to external references. **/Out**編譯器選項是選擇性的 Visual Basic 編譯器，而且對應 **-out**或 **-o**編譯 friend 時，應該不使用編譯器選項使用 F # 編譯器的組件。The **/out** compiler option is optional for the Visual Basic compiler, and the corresponding **-out** or **-o** compiler option should not be used when compiling friend assemblies with the F# compiler. 您可以使用[Sn.exe （強式名稱工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/sn-exe-strong-name-tool.md)完整公開金鑰擷取強式名稱金鑰 (.snk) 檔案。You can use [Sn.exe (Strong Name Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/sn-exe-strong-name-tool.md) to retrieve the full public key from a strong-named key (.snk) file. 若要這樣做，您可以執行下列步驟：To do this, you perform the following steps: 1. 從強式名稱金鑰檔擷取公開金鑰，不同的檔案：Extract the public key from the strong-named key file to a separate file: **Sn -p** *snk_file* *outfile***Sn -p** *snk_file* *outfile* 2. 在主控台中顯示完整的公開金鑰：Display the full public key to the console: **Sn-tp***outfile***Sn -tp** *outfile* 3. 複製並貼到您的程式碼的完整公開金鑰值。Copy and paste the full public key value into your source code. 如需有關如何使用屬性，請參閱下列主題：For more information about how to use the attribute, see the following topics: - [Friend 組件 (C++)Friend Assemblies (C++)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d55fee0-b7c2-4fbe-a23b-dfe424dc71cd) - [Friend 組件Friend Assemblies](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/df0c70ea-2c2a-4bdc-9526-df951ad2d055) ## Examples **簽署的組件****Signed assemblies** 下列範例會使用屬性，而讓`internal`方法名為`AppendDirectorySeparator`帶正負號的另一個組件中可見的簽署組件中。The following example uses the attribute to make an `internal` method named `AppendDirectorySeparator` in a signed assembly visible to another signed assembly. 它會定義`FileUtilities`類別，其中包含內部`AppendDirectorySeparator`方法。It defines a `FileUtilities` class that includes an internal `AppendDirectorySeparator` method. 屬性會套用至包含的組件`FileUtilities`類別。The attribute is applied to the assembly that contains the `FileUtilities` class. 屬性可讓組件名為`Friend1`存取這個內部成員。The attribute allows an assembly named `Friend1` to access this internal member. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/cs/assembly1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/vb/assembly1.vb#1)] 如果要將下列範例編譯至名為強式名稱組件`Friend1`，它可以順利呼叫`FileUtilities.AppendDirectorySeparator`方法，即使方法是內部`Assembly1`組件。If the following example is compiled into a strong-named assembly named `Friend1`, it can successfully call the `FileUtilities.AppendDirectorySeparator` method, even though the method is internal to the `Assembly1` assembly. 請注意，是否您從命令列編譯 C# 中，您必須使用 **/out**編譯器參數，以確保編譯器繫結至外部參考時，是使用 friend 組件的名稱。Note that if you are compiling in C# from the command line, you must use the **/out** compiler switch to ensure that the name of the friend assembly is available when the compiler binds to external references. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/cpp/friend1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/cs/friend1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/vb/friend1.vb#2)] 下列範例會使用屬性，而讓`internal`的不帶正負號的組件到另一個可見的成員未簽署的組件。The following example uses the attribute to make an `internal` member of an unsigned assembly visible to another unsigned assembly. 屬性可確保`internal``StringLib.IsFirstLetterUpperCase`名為組件中的方法`UtilityLib`都可以看到名為組件中的程式碼`Friend2`。The attribute ensures that the `internal` `StringLib.IsFirstLetterUpperCase` method in an assembly named `UtilityLib` is visible to the code in an assembly named `Friend2`. 以下是 UtilityLib.dll 的原始程式碼：The following is the source code for UtilityLib.dll: [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/cs/utilitylib.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/vb/utilitylib.vb#5)] **不帶正負號的組件****Unsigned assemblies** 下列範例提供的原始程式碼`Friend2`組件。The following example provides the source code for the `Friend2` assembly. 請注意，是否您從命令列編譯 C# 中，您必須使用 **/out**編譯器參數，以確保編譯器繫結至外部參考時，是使用 friend 組件的名稱。Note that if you are compiling in C# from the command line, you must use the **/out** compiler switch to ensure that the name of the friend assembly is available when the compiler binds to external references. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/cpp/friend2.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/cs/friend2.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.internalsvisibletoattribute/vb/friend2.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllInternalsVisible { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

span.span: This property does not return a value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AssemblyName As String
public: property System::String ^ AssemblyName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 Friend 組件的名稱，此組件將會看見標記 關鍵字的所有類型和類型成員。

span.span: Gets the name of the friend assembly to which all types and type members that are marked with the keyword are to be made visible.

value.span: 表示 friend 組件之名稱的字串。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the friend assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何使用屬性，請參閱下列主題：For more information about how to use the attribute, see the following topics: - [Friend 組件 (C++)Friend Assemblies (C++)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d55fee0-b7c2-4fbe-a23b-dfe424dc71cd) - [Friend 組件Friend Assemblies](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/df0c70ea-2c2a-4bdc-9526-df951ad2d055)
